sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../css/blog.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../css/style.css"; export default function Blog(props) { const post = props.post; const [show, setShow] = React.useState(false); React.useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => setShow(false), 4000); }, [show]); const showAl = () => { setShow(true); navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href); }; return ( <>

{post.title}

{post.desc}

الرجوع
{show === true ? (
شكرا

تم نسخ رابط الإعلان بنجاخ

) : ( "" )}
); }
